Name: Tribbble
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
Instructions: LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring ingredients in the order listed.
History: A drink created by bartenders at TGI Friday's UK in 2002. Named Tribbble with three 'B's' due to its three layers: butterscotch, banana and Baileys (the brand of Irish cream liqueur originally used).
Nutrition: One serving of Tribbble contains 136 calories
